data:item.name: AUD-EXP-42448
data:item.display_title: Multichannel Audio Codec Card for EVKs
data:item.overview: AUD-EXP-42448 is a multichannel audio codec card for EVKs. This audio card is based on Cirrus Logic CS42448 CODEC and includes six audio inputs and eight audio outputs. AUD-EXP-42448 is intended to demonstrate system and software capabilities and not to act as an audio reference design.
